title: George Washington Carver National Monument: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Safety Tips:  Stay on established trails. Watch your footing around the streams and pond. Do not drink the water. Swimming, wading, or fishing are not allowed. Be alert for poison ivy, ticks, and stinging insects. Do not climb on fences or cemetery headstones. Pets must be leashed and attended. For firearms regulations, please see Laws & Policies. Do not damage or remove plants, wildlife, or historical features; all are protected by federal law. Emergencies: call 911.
